text: Charlotte Bathe (born 22 September 1965) is a British equestrian. She competed in the individual eventing at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:British female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ipswich
title: Charlotte Bathe
